response.headline: Friends & Yard, Seongsu - vegetarian-friendly brunch spot in Seoul with avocado toast and eggs
response.summary: Friends & Yard in Seongsu district offers vegetarian brunch options including avocado toast topped with soft-boiled eggs, feta cheese, and greens. Holly from Life in Korea shares vegetarian-friendly spots in Seoul, noting Korea isn't the most vegetarian-friendly country.

extracted_text: incredible brunch spot with vegetarian options
Vegetarian Friendly Food Spots in Seoul

vegetarian friendly places to visit in Seoul! Personally I don't think Korea is the most vegetarian friendly country, hence why I stopped being veggie. But my cousin came to visit & here's some veggie friendly spots we visited!
image_details.key_interest: Restaurant recommendation with specific vegetarian menu items
visual_hierarchy: Avocado toast with eggs on plates
Caption about vegetarian spots in Seoul
